comment_data.body: There doesn't seem to be a licence associated with the repository?

https://github.com/phaazon/stack-haddock-upload/issues/1

Yeah.. I don't know, this is tiny code, but still yes.
Just use it. :) I’ll put a WTFPL on it because I really don’t care. :)
Actually, I made it BSD 0-Clause. Have fun peeps.
